meanings.definition: An elaborate and spectacular display or event.
meanings.sent1: The circus was an extravaganza of colorful lights and talented performers.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show was a true extravaganza of glamour and style.
meanings.sent3: The school play turned into an unexpected extravaganza when the lead actor forgot his lines.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night was an extravaganza of twinkling lights, like a sea of stars.
meanings.sent5: The music festival was an unforgettable extravaganza of sound and energy.

meanings.definition: A lavish or extravagant production or performance.
meanings.sent1: The Broadway musical was an extravagant extravaganza of costumes and set designs.
meanings.sent2: The opera singer's performance was a lavish extravaganza of powerful vocals.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party turned into an unexpected extravaganza when the magician made the cake disappear.
meanings.sent4: The film director's latest movie was an extravaganza of special effects and action sequences.
meanings.sent5: The royal ball was a grand extravaganza of elegance and sophistication.
